description.lang: The Smartly Gateway (SGW) is the brain in a Smart Home solution. The Gateway enables an unified Home Automation solution.It has Z-Wave integrated, as well as internal USB extension connectors which may be used to expand the SGWs future abilities.The Gateway is designed to reduce installation cost to a minimum. It can be installed on a DIN rail within the fuse cabinet, or externally on the wall.
Used for lifeline, gateway sending Device Reset Locally
